description: A coldStart trap signifes that the sending
protocol entity is reinitializing itself such that
the agent's configuration or the protocol entity
A DS1 Alarm Trap indicates a DS1 Line Status
bit has changed state, producing an Alarm Event
for the DS1 interface. The bit map Line Events
variable identifies the alarm event(s). The bit
map Line Status variable contains the interface
status when the alarm occurred. Only enabled
(arm set) status produce an Alarm Trap.

Summary.eval: ($v3 & 1) ? 'DS1 Line $v1 status: No Alarm' : (($v3 & 2) ? 'DS1 Line $v1 status: Yellow Alarm' : (($v3 & 4) ? 'DS1 Line $v1 status: Near end LOF' : (($v3 & 8) ? 'DS1 Line $v1 status: Far end sending AIS' : (($v3 & 16) ? 'DS1 Line $v1 status: Near end sending AIS' : (($v3 & 32) ? 'DS1 Line $v1 status: Red Alarm' : (($v3 & 64) ? 'DS1 Line $v1 status: Near end loss of signal' : (($v3 & 128) ? 'DS1 Line $v1 status: Near end is looped' : (($v3 & 256) ? 'DS1 Line $v1 status: TS16 AIS' : (($v3 & 512) ? 'DS1 Line $v1 status: Far end sending TS16 LOMF' : (($v3 & 1024) ? 'DS1 Line $v1 status: Near end sending TS16 LOMF' : (($v3 & 2048) ? 'DS1 Line $v1 status: Test code at Near end' : 'DS1 Line $v1 status: Undefined')))))))))))

tests: $SNMPTRAPCMD ADTRAN-ACTDAX-MIB::ds1Alarm ADTRAN-DS1-MIB::adDS1AlarmIndex i 1 ADTRAN-DS1-MIB::adDS1LineEvent i 2 RFC1406-MIB::dsx1LineStatus i 2
$SNMPTRAPCMD ADTRAN-ACTDAX-MIB::ds1Alarm ADTRAN-DS1-MIB::adDS1AlarmIndex i 1 ADTRAN-DS1-MIB::adDS1LineEvent i 1 RFC1406-MIB::dsx1LineStatus i 1
$SNMPTRAPCMD ADTRAN-ACTDAX-MIB::ds1Alarm ADTRAN-DS1-MIB::adDS1AlarmIndex i 9 ADTRAN-DS1-MIB::adDS1LineEvent i 136 RFC1406-MIB::dsx1LineStatus i 136
$SNMPTRAPCMD ADTRAN-ACTDAX-MIB::ds1Alarm ADTRAN-DS1-MIB::adDS1AlarmIndex i 9 ADTRAN-DS1-MIB::adDS1LineEvent i 1 RFC1406-MIB::dsx1LineStatus i 1

description: The index value which uniquely identifies the DS1
interface. The interface identified by a particular
value of this index is the same interface as identified
variables.name: ADTRAN-DS1-MIB::adDS1AlarmIndex

description: This bit map variable indicates state changes in the
DS1 line status variable (dsx1LineStatus). When a line
status bit changes state, the corresponding line event
bit is set in this variable. If armed, setting the event
will generate an Alarm Trap. After reporting the events
in an Alarm Trap or Get response, the device clears
The various alarm event bit positions are:
2 Far end LOF ( a.k.a., Yellow Alarm )
8 Far end sending AIS ( Blue Alarm )
32 Near end LOF ( a.k.a., Red Alarm )
2048 Near End detects a test code
4096 any line status not defined here
variables.name: ADTRAN-DS1-MIB::adDS1LineEvent

description: This variable indicates the Line Status of the
interface. It contains loopback, failure, re-
The dsx1LineStatus is a bit map represented as a sum
therefore, it can represent multiple failures (alarms) and
dsx1NoAlarm should be set if and only if no other flag is
If the dsx1LoopbackState bit is set, the loopback in ef-
fect can be determined from the dsx1LoopbackConfig object.
2 dsx1RcvFarEndLOF Far end LOF (a.k.a., Yellow Alarm)
4 dsx1XmtFarEndLOF Near end sending LOF Indication
32 dsx1LossOfFrame Near end LOF (a.k.a., Red Alarm)
64 dsx1LossOfSignal Near end Loss Of Signal
512 dsx1RcvFarEndLOMF Far End Sending TS16 LOMF
1024 dsx1XmtFarEndLOMF Near End Sending TS16 LOMF
2048 dsx1RcvTestCode Near End detects a test code
4096 dsx1OtherFailure any line status not defined here
variables.name: RFC1406-MIB::dsx1LineStatus

description: A DS1 Threshold Crossing Alert has occurred. The
Performance Parameters which have exceeded their
Threshold Values are identified in the bit mapped
Alert variables for the Near End and Far End DS1
interface. Parameters identify Alerts for the
Current 15 minute interval and Total variables.

event.Summary: Performance threshold crossed on DS1 line $v1

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD ADTRAN-ACTDAX-MIB::ds1Alert ADTRAN-DS1-MIB::adDS1AlertIndex i 9999 ADTRAN-DS1-MIB::adDS1CurrentAlert i 1 ADTRAN-DS1-MIB::adDS1TotalAlert i 1 ADTRAN-DS1-MIB::adDS1FarCurrentAlert i 1 ADTRAN-DS1-MIB::adDS1FarTotalAlert i 1

description: The index value which uniquely identifies the DS1
interface. The interface identified by a particular
value of this index is the same interface as identified
variables.name: ADTRAN-DS1-MIB::adDS1AlertIndex

description: This DS1 performance status variable indicates Threshold
Crossing Alerts for Near End Current 15 minute interval.
An alert bit is set in this variable when the value of
the dsx1CurrentTable object exceeds the Threshold Value.
This variable contains the sum of alert values.
Threshold Crossing Alert bit position values:
variables.name: ADTRAN-DS1-MIB::adDS1CurrentAlert

description: This DS1 performance status variable indicates Threshold
Crossing Alerts for Near End Total performance variables.
An alert bit is set in this variable when the value of
the dsx1TotalTable object exceeds the Threshold Value.
This variable contains the sum of alert values.
Threshold Crossing Alert bit position values:
variables.name: ADTRAN-DS1-MIB::adDS1TotalAlert

description: This DS1 performance status variable indicates Threshold
Crossing Alerts for Far End Current 15 minute interval.
An alert bit is set in this variable when the value of
the dsx1FarEndCurrentTable object exceeds the Threshold
Value. This variable contains the sum of alert values.
Threshold Crossing Alert bit position values:
variables.name: ADTRAN-DS1-MIB::adDS1FarCurrentAlert

description: This DS1 performance status variable indicates Threshold
Crossing Alerts for Far End Total performance variables.
An alert bit is set in this variable when the value of
the dsx1FarEndTotalTable object exceeds the Threshold
Value. This variable contains the sum of alert values.
Threshold Crossing Alert bit position values:
variables.name: ADTRAN-DS1-MIB::adDS1FarTotalAlert
